reviewText: Unlike the first reviewer, I actually watched the DVD (several times actually).  This DVD is hands down the best instructional film I've ever seen on the Lo Shu "Magic Square."  The instructor, Shane, takes a topic that is usually presented as mystical and mysterious and teaches it in an easy to understand fashion.  He links the square with the trigrams from the I-Ching to present a fully functional diagnostic and healing system.  I've been using the material from the film and I can testify that it's incredibly powerful.  I can't wait for Volume 3!
Returned without even opening after watching the first poorly done DVD.
